title: Add company
content:
This page explains how to add a company record. To manage and provide services, you must first add details of your company and your customer companies in the agent interface.

Add company

  1. Click  > Plan > Company. This directs you to the Companies tab, which displays the companies added in the agent interface.
  2. Click New.
  3. Enter the name of the company in the Name box.
  4. Enter the identification code of the company in the Code box.
  5. Select the company type from the Company type list. The following are the available company types.

    Company type

    Description

    Internal

    An internal department or unit within a large company.

    Vendor

    		 A company that develops and sells software or hardware products.

    Supplier

    A company or individual that provides raw materials, components, or products required by manufacturers to create finished goods.

    Manufacturer

    A company that produces finished goods by using raw materials, components, and labor.

    Distributor

    A company or individual that acts as a sales partner for manufacturers. Distributors buy products in bulk from manufacturers and resell them to wholesalers or retailers.

    Wholesaler

    A company or individual that buys large quantities of goods from manufacturers or distributors and resells them in smaller quantities to retailers or other businesses.

    Service provider

    A company or individual that provides services to other businesses or end users.

    Cloud service provider

    A type of service provider that offers cloud-based services.

    Publisher

    A company that publishes software, digital books, or digital content.

    Customer

    An individual or company that purchases and consumes the product or service.
    Partner A company or individual that collaborates with another company to deliver services and achieve shared goals. 
  6. Enter the DUNS number in the DUNS number box. This information is provided by the company.
  7. Enter a description of the company in the Description box.
  8. Click SAVE & EDIT. This displays the general information of the company you just added.
  9. To add additional information, click the Show more link in the Company details section.
  10. Specify the following additional details:

    Field

    Description

    Logo

    The logo of the company. 
    Web site The URL of the company’s official website.

    Phone

    The support contact number of the company.

    Email

    The support email address of the company.

    Fax

    The fax number of the company.
    Account team
    The team from your organization responsible for managing the business relationship with the customer company and maintaining its information in the application.
    This field is relevant only for customer companies.
    Support team
    The team from your organization responsible for providing technical assistance, troubleshooting, and customer support to the customer company.
    This field is relevant only for customer companies.
    Primary customer contact
    The main point of contact within the customer company responsible for communicating updates to company information, handling escalations, and coordinating with your organization.
    This field is relevant only for customer companies.
    Security contact
    The person from the customer company responsible for security-related communications.
    This field is relevant only for customer companies.
    Industry The sector in which the company operates. The available options are: Finance, Healthcare, and Technology.
    Time zone The time zone in which the company operates. Used for scheduling meetings, determining support availability, and ensuring service delivery aligns with business hours.
    Grace period (days) The additional number of days provided beyond the due date before suspensions or terminations take effect.
    Domain The official web domain associated with the company.
    External reference The unique identifier or reference number used for mapping the company record with external systems.
    Allow surveys
    Specifies whether the company allows surveys or feedback requests for customer satisfaction or market research.
    This field is relevant only for customer companies.
    Allow notifications
    Specifies whether the company allows notifications, alerts, or updates related to account activity, events, or cases. This field is relevant only for customer companies.
  11. Click Save on the toolbar. 
  12. Click Back on the toolbar to return to the Companies tab. You can see the company record you created.
